snippet.title: Bearnard - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Bearnard – a blend between a platformer and turn-based card game. Embark on a journey with a sassy bear archer, the title hero. Collect and use cards to defeat enemies in tactical duels, combine your attacks, discover various levels, and solve physics-based puzzles to save the forest.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/bearnard-at-yt 

Other social media:
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bearnardthegame
Twitter/X: https://www.tiktok.com/@bearnardthegame
